PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-21992002-12-12,  EC,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisEnactment of an ORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 - which adds ammonia dissolved in water, nonylphenol and its ethoxylates, effluents of textile mills that use wet processing and inorganic chloramines to Schedule 1 to the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0010 Publication Date: 2003-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
